kr.neolab.sdk.pen.bluetooth

Class BTOfflineAdt

  • java.lang.Object
    • kr.neolab.sdk.pen.bluetooth.BTOfflineAdt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPenAdt

    public class BTOfflineAdt
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPenAdt
    Created by KIM on 2018-02-20. This class is almost same BTAdt. But OfflineConnectedThread(using Piped Stream) is added.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BTOfflineAdt.ConnectedThread
      Connection Object
      class  BTOfflineAdt.OfflineConnectedThread
      Read data from piped input stream and then send to commProcessor20.
